title: 97C.087 SPECIAL FISH MANAGEMENT REGISTRATION.
text:
If the commissioner determines it is necessary to require that a species of fish be registered, the commissioner shall prescribe, by rule, the species to be registered, registration procedures, and endorsement eligibility requirements.
Application for a special fish management endorsement must be accompanied by a $5, nonrefundable application fee for each endorsement. A person may not make more than one endorsement application each calendar year. If a person makes more than one application, the person is ineligible for a special fish management endorsement for that calendar year after determination by the commissioner, without a hearing.
